name: Mary Tyler Moore: TV and Movies Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: Laura Petrie slips up on TV and reveals a secret about Alan Brady. What is it?
questions.explanation:
He's bald.

	This was one of the most popular episodes. Reiner (as Alan Brady) was never funnier.

questions.text: Laura has her portrait painted; it pops up years later in an art gallery. Who played the painter?
questions.explanation:
Carl Reiner.

	The portrait is of Laura in the nude. Again, Reiner was quite funny.

questions.text: Laura pumps Sally about Sally's new boyfriend; she finds out a secret. What is it?
questions.explanation:
He's a mortician.

	Anthony Stone turns out to be a louse. Laura learns that he's a mortician; Rob learns that he's married.

questions.text: Mary Richards has a special dish prepared for one of her parties. What is it?
questions.explanation:
Veal Prince Orloff.

	Mr. Grant takes several portions, then has to return them.

questions.text: Mary has problems dealing with the death of a member of the television station. Who died?
questions.explanation:
A clown.

	Chuckles, the clown, is killed by an elephant. Mary can't quite decide whether to laugh or cry.

questions.text: Mary has a "singles" encounter with a dentist. Who played him?
questions.explanation:
Shelley Berman.

	Shelley Berman plays the interested (but slightly weird) single dentist.

questions.text: Mary Tyler Moore starred in "Ordinary People". Who was NOT in the cast with her?
questions.explanation:
Matthew Broderick.

	Sutherland played her husband,, Hutton played her son, Hirsch played the son's psychiatrist. Moore played an emotionally cold woman who struggled to deal with the death of her other son.

questions.text: Mary starred in which of these Elvis Presley movies?
questions.explanation:
Change of Habit.

	Curiously, Mary played a nun.

questions.text: Mary starred in "Six Weeks". Who was her co-star?
questions.explanation:
Dudley Moore.

	This movie teamed two actors who were hot at the time. Somehow, the movie didn't succeed at the box office or with the critics.

questions.text: Mary appeared (as Mary Richards) on "Rhoda". Her surprise arrival  caused a problem for Joe and Rhoda. Why?
questions.correct: They were planning to go out of town
options: Joe had just lost his job
questions.explanation:
They were planning to go out of town.

	Rhoda and Joe were planning to get away, but Mary's unannounced visit changed everything.
